Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by West Texas in 1978...
Had first career hit on 9/25/1981, off Chad Romig (Ash)...
Traded from West Texas to Boston (UBA) on 4/29/1982 (Going to PIL: 1B W. Boydston, P B. Chappel, LF J. Robinson. Going to WT: P T. George, LF D. Perdomo, 3B S. Wesson)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1982, off Elly Mae Clampett (PON)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Halifax on 5/11/1984...
Drove in 8 runs against Lynchburg on 6/20/1985...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against West Texas on 8/14/1985...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Lynchburg on 9/10/1985...
Injured on 6/29/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Manchester on 8/3/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1988, hitting .526 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 4/8/1989...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Diablo on 5/13/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1990, hitting .423 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
